title: Ep 24: Sydney Kramer
itunes:title: Ep 24: Sydney Kramer
itunes:subtitle: Sydney Kramer of @CrepesOfWrath on Insta ( www.instagram.com/crepesofwrath ) joins us to talk about making the perfect chocolate chip cookie (or any cookie) using her product pick.Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks...
description:
Sydney Kramer of @CrepesOfWrath on Insta ( www.instagram.com/crepesofwrath ) joins us to talk about making the perfect chocolate chip cookie (or any cookie) using her product pick.


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod


Then Caroline talks about a few months with the Aquis Hair Turban, and the hot tub. Again. Because we recorded this in February and I forgot I had talked about the hot tub and then talked about the hot tub again. I’m Not Crazy, It’s Just The Pandemic Talking!


Mentioned On This Episode!

  • Aquis Hair Turban: https://fave.co/2yFqXEq
  • The Hot Tub: https://amzn.to/2xNGZvO
  • Cookie Dough Scoops: https://amzn.to/3b8fESw 


Sydney’s famous cookies: http://www.thecrepesofwrath.com/2013/01/21/chocolate-chunk-cookies-2/


Sydney on Anderson Cooper: https://www.youtube.com/watch?list=UUSmL45bolW0JFvI_WPvtqeQ&v=jvPwYMF1L8c&feature=player_embedded


PS. If you aren’t listening to Doree and Kate’s new podcast, HERE FOR YOU, it’s a great way to both acknowledge the state of the world while also not overwhelming yourself (as I tend to do). Listen here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/here-for-you/id1503438711


Thanks for listening!

Site Makeover Alert! Check out blog posts and all of the recommended products by past guests, listeners and Caroline at www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 

Shop the Amazon store! https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit

Join the book club! We’re reading Wow, No Thank You by Samantha Irby: https://www.instagram.com/p/B-kvVHqnKiH/

The Spreadsheet is UNDER CONSTRUCTION and it will be back soon, better than ever!

Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod


We have a phone number! Call it! You may be featured on an upcoming special listeners-only ep of the podcast: 424-245-0736.

Want to get in touch more formally? Have a rec you want to rec? Shoot me an email! Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
